mapper.select: select count(*) from (SELECT IFNULL(u.`xingming`,'') `name`,u.create_time createTime, IFNULL(u.avatar,'') avatar,u.phone,cu.id userId FROM `user` u, c_user_role_attribute cu WHERE u.id = cu.user_id AND cu.role_id = 1 AND u.parent_id = ( SELECT user_id FROM c_user_role_attribute WHERE id =#{userId} )) t

select * from (SELECT IFNULL(u.`xingming`,'') `name`,u.create_time createTime, IFNULL(u.avatar,'') avatar,u.phone,cu.id userId FROM `user` u, c_user_role_attribute cu WHERE u.id = cu.user_id AND cu.role_id = 1 AND u.parent_id = ( SELECT user_id FROM c_user_role_attribute WHERE id =#{userId} )) t
order by userId desc limit #{offset},#{pageSize}

where.if: and not EXISTS(SELECT identity_id from c_platform_status where identity_id=t.userId)
and EXISTS(SELECT identity_id from c_platform_status where identity_id=t.userId and level_id=#{level})

if.test: startDate!=null and startDate!='' and endDate!=null and endDate!=''
